casebody.data:
First Department,

March, 1969

(March 4, 1969) James Oszust, an Infant, by His Mother and Natural Guardian, Eleanor Oszust, et al., Respondents, v. Truro Transportation Corp. et al., Appellants.

Order entered on October 30, 1968, advancing the case on the calendar vacated on the facts -and the law without costs. Plaintiffs-respondents conceded the invalidity of the order and consented ,to having it vacated. Under the circumstances the relief requested by defendants should be granted, without costs. Concur - Eager, J. P., Capozzoli, Nunez and Steuer, JJ.
